name: Gratisfaction- Contests Giveaways Referral Loyalty Rewards and Birthdays Program
author: AppsMav

sections.description:
If you are using WooCommerce plugin, please install Gratisfaction for WooCommerce to avoid technical difficulties

LIMITED TIME OFFER. HURRY!

ALL FEATURES. UNLIMITED USERS. UNLIMITED CAMPAIGNS. ONE FIXED PRICE: JUST $249/MONTH, BILLED ANNUALLY.

WANT TO SMASH YOUR MARKETING GOALS

Gratisfaction combines Social Media Contests, Sweepstakes, Referral Marketing & Loyalty Programs all-in-one

Use Gratisfaction to:

  • Get Traffic, Leads, Bookings & Sales
  • Increase Fans, Followers, Pins, Likes & social media reach
  • Increase Engagement
  • Get Repeat Purchases & Increase Customer Lifetime Value
  • Get Referrals
  • Run contests, sweepstakes, giveaways & promotions on Website, Tumblr, Blog etc.

IF YOU HAVE A WOOCOMMERCE STORE, THEN DOWNLOAD ‘GRATISFACTION FOR WOOCOMMERCE’ PLUGIN HERE

FREE (for 100 loyalty members.)

  • All Features Included
  • Unrestricted Access
  • Run unlimited campaigns
  • Easy to setup & manage
  • No contract. Cancel anytime
  • Create beautiful contests, referral & loyalty campaigns
  • All plans come with full range of features included

Key Features

  • Run Viral Social Contests, Sweepstakes & Giveaways for both visitors & customers- See some types of contests you can run using Gratisfaction. Thousands of combinations available to choose from.
  • Reward for Referrals on Purchases & Signups.
  • Customers can earn points & rewards for various activities including social sharing, social actions, purchases, signing up, and more. See a list of Actions for which you can reward both your customers & visitors
  • Setup viral referral marketing campaigns
  • Create Loyalty Programs to encourage Repeat Purchases & Increase Lifetime Value. Award Levels & Badges to increase activity and participation in your challenges.
  • Gratisfaction gives you the freedom & flexibility to run your campaigns anywhere.

WANT TO GET MORE SALES, LEADS, FOLLOWERS, SUBSCRIBERS AND REFERRALS THIS HOLIDAY SEASON?

Run Holidays Giveaways, Refer-a-Friend Campaigns, Instant Win Campaigns, Contests in minutes and Smash Your Marketing Goals

Pick a template from our festival library including Halloween, Black Friday Cyber Monday, Thanksgiving, Christmas, Diwali, Valentine’s Day, Easter and more…

View Holiday Season Templates

Gratisfaction helps you in all stages of your sales lifecycle

Drive Visitors- Get Leads — Convert to Customers — Keep Customers — Get Referrals – Increase Sales — Get Repeat Purchases — Increase Lifetime Value.

Reward Prospects & Customers. Keep Them Coming Back & Get Referrals

Gratisfaction allows you to quickly set up and run your own points & rewards based contests, sweepstakes, giveaways, loyalty and referral reward programs. Reward your leads, customers and referrals

Reward for sign ups & bookings

Give users points & rewards for creating an account. Create custom forms & capture leads & reservations with incentivization

Reward for purchases & run a loyalty program

With Gratisfaction you can reward customers with points for each purchase which they can then redeem for a reward.

Reward for visits & comments

Reward entrants with points for visits to your website, a particular web page or commenting on your wordpress blog post

Reward for referrals & social sharing

Get your participants & customers marketing for you! Give referrals & their invited friends points and rewards for both signups and purchases.

Reward for social media actions

Increase your Fans, Followers, Likes, ReTweets, Pins, Views, etc. Boost social media reach & engagement by rewarding users points & instant rewards for a multitude of social actions. See the list of Actions

Reward for participation in your surveys & quiz

Get great feedback from participants by rewarding them with points and prizes in return for participation in your surveys and quizzes.

Customers redeem points for rewards

When your customers gain enough points they can redeem those points for rewards.

Display on Website, Blog, etc.

Display your contests, sweepstakes, giveaways anywhere. The campaigns are 100% responsive.

Display Widgets

Activate different types of widgets.

Customize your campaign look & feel

Change colors of your campaign & widgets to reflect the overall branding of your site.

We value your feedback and happy to provide you with excellent support.

All the best and hope Gratisfaction helps you achieve your business objectives.
sections.installation:
1. Upload “Gratisfaction- Social Contests Referral Loyalty Rewards Program for WordPress” to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is Gratisfaction free?

Gratisfaction is aboslutely free for 100 loyalty members. It includes all features. You only pay based on the number of loyalty members. Take it for a spin today!
For a detailed look at pricing plans see our pricing page.

What features are available in the free version?

The short answer is all features. You can run any number of campaigns, get unrestricted use to all features, run loyalty programs, contests, etc.
Gratisfaction is free for upto 100 loyalty members. You can learn more about our plans & pricing at https://www.appsmav.com/gratisfaction.php

What kind of support do I get?

Gratisfaction is very easy and fast to set up. If you ever need assistance, we are here to support you. For any pre-sales or product inquiries, send us an email to sales@appsmav.com . Existing customers, please send email to support@appsmav.com

I have another question, what do I do?

Contact us Anytime! For any pre-sales or product inquiries, send us an email to sales@appsmav.com

0.1

  • Initial release.

0.1

This version have register shop feature with GR site.

0.2

This version have updated to fix loading issue.

0.3

This version have shortcode to add campaign on any page.

0.4

This version have signup process fixes with code confirmation in app.

0.5

tested version upto 4.6 release.

0.6

new release for success page adding

updated to support russian language on install

API URL changes

Bug fixes and optimization

New Feature – Website login for campaigns

Improvements – First name and last name separate fields added

Improvements – First name and last name issue

WordPress version 5.8 release compatibility
